name: Disembodied
summary:
Wishlist Now!

Disembodied uses hand tracking in a whole new way, featuring a unique style of gameplay only possible in XR.

Hold your hands in front of you, and every movement will be mirrored to a pair of disembodied hands.

Try not to fall off, as you manoeuvre them through small platforming levels, featuring various mechanics and challenges.

This game is still early in development. Wishlist now, and follow the socials to keep up to date.

Discord: https://discord.gg/UucU2CtKba
